text: Happy to see finally got kopitiam open and is 24hr operation with one of the stall is 24hr operation and different stall different operating hr.

17/5/2025
Had chup cai png ($4.20) & seafood bee hoon ($7) for early dinner, was ok. Indoor & alfresco dining available. Alfresco dining area is warm (5pm), hoping they will install fans & canopy. Cleaner was friendly. Today is the second day of business, I'll be back again.
We are happy to have a fully operational coffee shop in our neighbourhood again!
